title: Matt: Minecraft基岩版Server Alpha会在近期更新
author: 乔柚
txt_content:
本帖最后由 longlongz 于 2018-10-18 06:06 编辑 


The Bedrock Dedicated Server alpha is also getting updated soon and, once it is updated, can be downloaded at here
基岩版服务器软件会在近期更新，更新后你可以在此处下载

原贴 https://twitter.com/MattGartzke/status/1052235330923847680

replies.author: MuChenyu
replies.txt_content: 期待，能和JAVA版一样拓展性很强吗

replies.author: 小李哈哈
replies.txt_content: 最近、似乎更得很勤奋啊。

replies.author: MilkMC
replies.txt_content: 希望官方早点更，，，，1.7迫不及待

replies.author: MilkMC
replies.txt_content: 好吧，看错了，官方已经更了1.7.0.13！！！
